title: Clear day, slow city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A blue car drives slowly through a city intersection, with a red stop sign on the right.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.3 m/s). There are 11 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The blue car is driving slowly through a city intersection. There is a red stop sign on the right side of the road. The road is wet and there are other cars parked on the side of the road. The weather is clear and there is no fog or rain.
reasoning: The blue car is driving slowly through the intersection because there is a red stop sign on the right side of the road. The car is braking frequently, possibly due to the wet road conditions. The driver is being cautious and following traffic rules to ensure safety.
